div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
nouembris anno quo Supra

head.add: Inquisicio Johannis allirdes de badeskoth et cetera

div.p:
Alexander chamer Willelmus blinsele Dauid mar' Willelmus Kyntor
Willelmus nicholson' Willelmus murray Johannes arthour Johannes Sancler'
cristinus prat Johannes moir' Johannes annand' Willelmus buchan et alexander
prat Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes ruthirfurde auunculus Johannis
allirdes latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis Ide quadam terra Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico castrj ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Andree ancroft ex orientali ex vna et terram alexandri menzeis ex
occidentali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus boriam et
torrentem Sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et quod dictus Johannes est leg
et propinquior heres dicti quondam Johannis vnus de legittimis et propinquioribus
heredibus dicti quondam Johannis auunculi suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum
duas marcas vsualis monete scocie Et valuit xx s' tempore pacis
Et quod breviter de In capite de Suppremo domini nostro Rege
per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri
Regis per mortem dicti Johannis ruthirfurd' per Spacium vnius annj
et dimidij aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque
minime prosequentis datum et clausum

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes ruthirfurd' auunculus Jonete betson'
latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
Castrj ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Andree ancroft ex Orientali ex
vna et terram alexandri menyes ex occidentali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam
versus boriam et torrentem Sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et quod dicta Joneta est vna de
legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Johannis auunculi suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis et cetera prout in priore Inquisicione continetur

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
nouemb Decembris anno quo Supra

add.foreign: plegii inuenti per henricum forbes pro Willelmo Andirson'

div.p:
The saide day henry forbes of Kynnellar' fand' Robert
blinsel and Jonhne elphinstone of arth borrouis and
Souerte to the aldirman and ballieis to keip and warand' William
Andirsone eldar burges of this burghe skathtles of Certane
Siluer pavndis laid' in his handis anent the fulfilling of
ane Certane appontment betuix the said henry and cristy
moresone be thar handis vphaldin Ande the said henry
oblist him be his handis landis and gudis his ayris executoris and
assignez' to keip the saidez Robert and Jonhne Skathles
of the said' borrougange

the saide day Johne of lammyntone Androw lousone Alexander
prat and thome narne accusit for excerceing of merchandice
and flessar craft Ande for forstalling' of the tone referrit
thame to the aldirman and Counsall

Alexander menyeis Robertus blinsel Johannes Cullan Dauid menyeis Alexander
Rede Johannes Colisone Johannes Knollis Johannes Wormet Willelmus
portar alexander gray Willelmus futhes Willelmus Colp et Johannes thomson'
Jurati dicunt quod Johannes masone lator presencium est legittimus et
propinquior heres quondam Roberti mason patruj sui Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod non fuit terre neque annij annuj Redditus et cetera

The saide day the ballies assignit mononday that nixt cumis to
Alexander Watsone in auchchortj tile ansuer tile alexander pratis
Instance quhat he had to say tile him anent certane maile
clamit be the said Alexander prat of the said Alexanderis Watsonnis lande
and to bring his richtis the said day quhilkis he wald' wse in the said'
mater

The third day of December' the yer forsaid' the wif of William
andirson' deliuerit to henry forbes of Kynnellar' thre siluer
pecis tua siluer goblatis sex Siluer spvnis thre siluerit beltis
and ane maser' siluerit quhilkis was put in the handis of the
sad' William be the said henry obefor to remane quhill
Cristy moreson' gat j letter of Sesin of the tuelf partis of the
landis of Connalegy

add.foreign: plegii inuenti per Johannem mar' pro bonis Durvard

div.p:
the secunde day of December' the yer forsaid Jonhne of mar' fand'
alexander menyes Caucionar and Souerte to the aldirman and balyes be his hande
landis and gudis that the gudis and landis pertening to William Durvard
quhilkis the saide Jonhne happinnis to resaue In tutory salbe
kepit and he salbe responsale tharffor in ale thingis for the said Johne
of mar' eftir the tenor' of the kingis lettres of tutory directit thar
apon

the saide day philp of Dunbrek officiar' with certan suorne personis
deponit the gret bodelie aithez that thai hade prisit ane siluer'
tuschay to xxiiij s' takin be mastir William Srathachin
for certane annuell aucht to him quhilk hed presentit the mercat
four' mercat dais Obefor' quhilk tuschay the balyeis ordanit the
officiar' to pas' and offir' to the partj quhome to It pertant the partj payand
Siluer aucht tharapon' Ande gif the partj refus' or can nocht or be nocht comprehendit
to sele the said tuschay and mak the said' clerk be pait and deliuer
the Remanent to the partj of the Siluer of It

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo
die Decembris anno quo Supra

the said day the action' debatable' betuix Alexander prat and
alexander Watsone anent the malis clamit avand to the said
alexander prat of the saide alexander Watsones land' with consent
of the saide partiis be tham salf present and mastir Jonhe' bade
naghe procurator to the said alexander prat to the next law
day eftir yule and thai sal schew that day thar richtis sic as
thai will vys' and the said alexander prat sal schew the lettres
that he hes concerning the said mar' and gif he has ony vndir
the said alexander Watsonnis seile

the saide day Thomas narne and Wat of gareauche
accusit for the non Riding one Sanct nicholes day
with the abbat and prior of bonacord' for the vphaldin of
the honor of the tone put thame in the aldirmannis
will Ande richerdredhed' in likuys' accusit referrit
him to the aldirman et cetera

the saide day William of Jonhnestone was conuictit be
ane suorne assis' Jonhne of Cullane forspekar for
the strubulance of Jok moir' scolar and for the quhilkis
he had in ane Amerciament of the Court and to amend' as law
will and for to beir' in tyme to Cum

head.add: the payaris of the furdis male / to Jonhne Smyth

div.p:
The said day Robert blinsele William of chamer patrik leslie
and William goldsmitht Ilkane of thame pait xiij s' and iiij d'
of the wattir male of the furdis to Johne smyth sangstar of
the fisching of the yer' to Cum at commavnd' of the aldirman and the
Counsall Item' Johne Waus xiij s' and iiij d'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die Decembris
anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne of mar' grantit him avand' to patrik Rede
fyftene Schillingis scottis money the quhilk he oblist him to
freithe the said' patrik in his wattir maile of this next fishingis

head.add: William Johnson' ale' chapman in Inueroury

div.p:
the xxj day of December' the yer' forsaid' William Jonhnsone
in Inueroury attachit for forstallin of the burghe oblist him be the
fatht of his bodie to the aldirman to entir befor him and the balyeis
one the law day next eftir yule in the hed court thar to vndirlie
the thingis that is to be said' to him for the forstallin of the tone
and or to Cum betuix this and the saide day and appont with the aldirman
And' gif he falyeis to pay x merkis and the Amerciamentis of the court

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij
die mensis Decembris anno quo Supra

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisionem breuium margarete Kintor' et mariote Kintor
div.p:
Alexander Rede Willelmus blinsele Willelmus chamer Dauid mar' senior
Willelmus portar thomas Waus Andreas ancroft Johannes blak David
adamsone Willelmus gray matheus branche patricius leslie et David
tulidef Jurati dicunt quod quondam Richardus Kintor Auus mar
garete Kintor' latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de tribus croftis Jacentibus in territorio
Croftorum de Rubyslaw quorum vnum Jacet inter Croftum Johanni quondam Johannis mar'
ex Orientali ex vna et Croftum ministrj domus sancte trinitatis ex occidentali partibus ab
ab altera secundum Croftum Jacet inter Croftum quondam Johannis henrici Cullane
ex orientali et croftum qw quondam Willelmi vocat ex occidentali Et tercium Croftum
Jacet ad caudas's' overwrites 'm'. dictorum croftorum vers inter Croftum quondam Johannis honysone
ex orientali ex vna et croftum quondam Johannis mar' ex occidentali partibus ab altera
Et quod dicta mariota margareta est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti
quondam Ricardi auj sui de dictis croftis cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et
quod dicte crofte siue terre cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum xiij s' et iiij d'
Et valuerunt x s' tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in Capite de domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis
per decessum mariote Kyntor Kynnoir' Relicte quondam dicti Ricardi vltimo
possessorum eiusdem per racione coniuncte Infeodacionis per Spacium dimidij annj aut
eo circa in defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis
datum et clausum et cetera

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam dictus Ricardus auus mariote Kintor
latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de dictis terris siue croftis et cetera Et quod
dicta mariota est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Ricardi auj
suj et cetera omnia ut premissum est et cetera

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Andreas litstar frater margarete litstar'
latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente in vico viridi inter communionem
viam regiam ex orientali ex vna et Solium cuiusdam alterius terre
Johannis litstar patris suj ex Occidentali partibus ab altera ac de dimidio orti tocius
tenementi eiusdem Johannis litstar dicte terre cum pertinenciis Et quod dicta margareta
est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Andree fratris suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum
xiij s' et iiij d' Et valuit x s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
Agnetis Srathachin relicte quondam dicti Andree racione coniuncte
Infeodacionis pro toto tempore vite sue datum et clausum et cetera

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod Katherina litstar soror dicti quondam
Andree est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Andree
et cetera et Cetera omnia ut in priore Retornati

The Sowme aucht to the tow king be the town' of Abirdene
of auchtene yeris bigane is ane hundreth lvj pundis
her'of pait to Alexander leslie xxvj pund Ande to thomas symson'
of the yer of lxxxiiij viij li' And' thomas forest of tua yeris
xvij li' vj s' viij d' And' to Duncan froster of the yeir of lxxxxij
and xiiij yeris xvij li' vj s' viij d' And' to James of Dougles
of the yeris of lxxxx viij li' xiij s' iiij d' and' Duncane
froster of the yeris of lxxxxv xvj xvij and xviij yeris xxxiiij
pundis xiij s' iiij d' And' ale thir sowmez' allowit in the brewis
Summa jC xx li' xiij s' iiij d'
Sa Restis xxxv li' vj s' viij d' of the quhilkis pait
to Jonhne of meldrum viij li' xiij s' iiij d' Item
to george Robesoun' of the yer of auchtj and vij viij pundis
xiij s' iiij d' Item to thomas symsone of the yer of auchtj
and thre viij li' xiij s' iiij d'

Curia capitalis burgi de abirdene
tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die mensis octobris Januarij
anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Nono

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus
Johannes Kynninmond' procurator vicariorum ac capellanorum chorj
ecclesie cathedralis abirdonensis protestabatur in forma Juris pro
vno annuo Redditu dictis capellanis annuatim debit'
de quadam terra Jacente in futy inter terram
ex australi et terram ex boreali partibus
ab al'l' overwrites 'b'.tera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas murray protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xviij s' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico Castrj ex
portam ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram
ex orientali ex vna et terram
ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus thoma philp Willelmo scherar' et Andrea
nachtj seriando

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne
assis' Thomas leslie forspekar that Androw Cullane
yongar sal resaue fra mathow turnor' xvj barrellis
of buitir thai beand' sufficient merchand' gudis and mak him pament
tharfor and for gif he has ony pertinearis to follow tham
to releyve him tharanent

add.foreign: Electio commissariorum huius burgi pro assedacione pistatorum et terrarum eiusdem

div.p:
The saide day the haill tone warnit be the hand'bell
throw ale the partis of the Samyn ande gathrit batht
balyeis Consale and haill communite Circualy Inquirit
be philp of Dunbrek officiar' grantit consentit and ordanit
be ane haill voce to f set al thar fischingis and wattiris
of Dee and Done ande al thar' common' landis for fyve yeris
eftir thar' generale assedacion Instan' be Runnyn to nichtbouris
Induellaris of the tone for the bigin and reformacion of thar'
kirk quer' and kirk werk ande for vthir nedfule thingis
and chargis concerning the common' profit of the tone Ande chesit
thir personis commissaris to Sett the Samyn In the first sere
Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman Alexander menyes Robert blinsele Dauid
menyes Jonhne of Cullane Alexander rede Alexander chamer Jonhne
Colisone and Jonhne Wormet

The saide day It was deliuerit fundin and decretit be the
Consale that the barnys and widew of vmquhill Jonhne
of gilespy aw to haue the money avand' be Alexander
of chamer for the outquiting of his croft liand' in futy
becaus' thai coud' fynd' nane vthir ayris to vmquhill
Robert of gilespy bot the saide ayris

the saide day Comperit Alexander Watsone and offerit him
redy to schew his richtis of his land' that he will vys'
anent the debatis betuix him and alexander prat becaus' the
saide alexander prat comperit nocht protestand' the tennentis be nocht
wexit nor' Inquiet et cetera quhill he war' warnit

Vniuersis ad quorum Noticiam presentes littere peruenerint burgenses et communitas burgi de abirdene
eternam in domino salutem Noueritis nos matura auisacione prehabita vtilitate nostra in hac
parte debite premisa et diligenter considerata Et notant' pro constructione et reformacione ecclesie nostre
parrochialis aliisque cause racionalibus animum nostrum monen' fecisse constituisse et ordinasse
necnon tenore presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros comburgenses predictos videlicet Johannem Ruthirfurd' militem
ac prepositum nostri Alexandrum menyes Robertum blinsel David menyes Johannem Cullan alexandrum Rede alexandrum
chamer Johannem colison' et Johannem Wormet nostros legitimos veros et indubitatos commissarios actores
factores et deputatos speciales dan' et conceden' eisdem commissariis et eorum maiori partj
nostrarum plenam potestatem et mandatum speciale omnes et singulas piscatorias nostras libertati dicti burgi
Scriptan' tam aque de Deeque de Done terras nostras Redditus et posiciones vniuersas
nobis pertinen' seu Juste scripture valen' assedand' arrendand' et ad firmas dimittend'
vicinis nostris infra dictum burgum commorantibus pro terminis quinque annorum plenarie complendorum Ac
omnia alia et singula terra dictam assedacionem necessaria gerend' et excercend' que nos
facere possemus si present' in premissis personaliter Interessemus Ac si que sunt que mandatum
exigant maius speciale Ratum gratum haben' et habiturum totum et quicquid dicti
nostri commissarij seu maior perer per eorundem in premissis et premissorum quo libet
nomine nostri iuste duxerint aut dixerit faciend' sub ypotheca et obligacione omnium
bonorum nostrorum mobilium et immobilium presencium et futurorum In quorum omnium et singulorum fidem
et testimonium Sigillum nostrum communione presentibus est appensum apud dictum burgum xiijo
die mensis Januarij anno Domini millesimo ccccmo nonagesimo nono
